title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with a nice grey tone and good quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty and good quality!
items.body: I got the rust color and it’s very pretty. This sweater is not a tunic or cropped. It comes just below the waist line. So tired of tunics! Read more
items.author: mimus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft fabric- baggy fit
items.body: The fabric is buttery soft, it is not a stiff chunky sweater. I loved the feel and the quality. It is baggier than I expected, so I returned it and ordered a size smaller. I usually wear a 12-14 , the XL was too big. A large will be much better. Read more
items.author: J. Davis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A modern sleek sweater option
items.body: The sweater is great, but a little thinner then it looked but I really like the sleeves and clean lines. I got the gray, and it came with light small brown buttons. I wasnt a fan of the buttons color or the size on such a structured modern sweater. Amazon has a nice selection of black buttons depending in your style. I choose a celtic 7/8 inch very nice round decorative button and changed them out. The buttons are sewn on a 1 inch border so it was easy trading them out. It looks much more stylish and expensive with the new buttons. Im going to pick up a few more of them and depending on color will not hesitate to change out the small buttons for something more interesting. A clean sleek look for fall and even better with a ruched white turtle neck dickie insert. Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It did not look right on me.
items.body: Very nice quality. Soft and I thought it was very cute. It just did not look right on me. Read more
items.author: Hilda

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: I am so dissatisfied with this sweater. I wore it in Thanksgiving, prior to washing. It was brand new and looked great. I hand washed it and line dried it. It shrunk! I didn’t put it in the dryer. It is now too tight to wear. Read more
items.author: Carol Lincoln

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order UP in size!
items.body: This is a really cute and soft sweater! Nice color as well! Not too heavy which is great for inside or layering. Nice long sleeves! Runs very small, however! I typically wear an XL, sometimes L. This was waaay too tight!! Suggest ordering UP in size! Read more
items.author: BP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brrrrr. In Fl
items.body: Cool weather it Fl. And this came in just in time. Stylist. Fit sizing correct. Read more
items.author: Chris

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars It's a pass for me!
items.body: I will start with the positives...the sweater is really cute, looked great on, loved the design and the fit was perfect. Not too long, perfect length for me. Now the negatives...after having it for a month and wearing it a few times it is already looking really worn. The material is not holding up. It is getting really fuzzy and doesnt look good. I bought 2 of these and I have worn the black but not the gray yet so I can see the difference in the material after a few wears. I want to say I loved it but long term, for the price, is a no for me. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Light Army Green, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Rust Red, Grey, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
